Editorial quality controls and policy-aligned review loops
Reusable workflow templates for documentation teams

events.title: AI Accelerator Workshop (dev)
events.subtitle: From core prompting to professional AI systems
events.tagline: Bundle AI Power Prompting with advanced build labs so your team launches repeatable AI workflows that run the business better.
events.summary: The AI Accelerator Workshop includes the AI Power Prompting course and layers on professional AI features so you can run your business more efficiently. You will leave with hands-on practice using custom GPTs, AI projects, and research frameworks tailored to your workflows across four focused weeks.

description.summary: This blended, four-week program is ideal for teams who want a head start with AI fundamentals and the confidence to operationalize advanced capabilities without reinventing the wheel each time.
description.bodyMd:
## Who this is for

- Beginners who want to get a head start with AI and immediately apply it to their business
- Operators eager to save time with repeatable AI processes like customer support, marketing content, and FAQ responses

## What you will build

- Custom GPTs configured around your business scenarios
- Project spaces that keep prompts, files, and context organized for future work
- Research frameworks that turn AI findings into confident decisions

highlights: Understand how today's AI models generate answers
Custom GPTs tuned to your workflows
Organize prompts, files, and research in AI projects
audienceBullets: Beginners who want to get a head start with AI and immediately apply it to their business
Operators eager to save time with repeatable AI processes like customer support, marketing content, and FAQ responses
buildBullets: Custom GPTs configured around your business scenarios
Project spaces that keep prompts, files, and context organized for future work
Research frameworks that turn AI findings into confident decisions
outcomes: Master the fundamentals of AI prompting and responsible use.
Configure custom GPTs that reflect your brand voice and processes.
Launch AI projects that organize prompts, files, and context for ongoing work.
Practice deep research techniques to inform strategy, competitor intel, and planning.

agenda.title: Week 1: AI Power Prompting Core
agenda.outcome: Practice the four core prompt types across writing, analysis, and ideation.
agenda.details: Adopt responsible-use guardrails that build trust inside your team.

agenda.title: Week 2: Custom GPT Foundations
agenda.outcome: Configure custom instructions, knowledge, and actions that keep outputs on brand.
agenda.details: Test and iterate GPT behaviors with real scenarios from your organization.

agenda.title: Week 3: AI Projects and Workflow Organization
agenda.outcome: Organize prompts, files, and context inside AI project spaces.
agenda.details: Create reusable folders for marketing, support, and operations workflows.

agenda.title: Week 4: Market-Ready AI Delivery
agenda.outcome: Use advanced AI research strategies for competitor analysis and market planning.
agenda.details: Package your offering for GPT marketplace listings and discovery.

faq.question: Do we need AI experience before attending?
faq.answer: No. The workshop starts with AI Power Prompting to establish the fundamentals and then moves into advanced capabilities with guided practice.

faq.question: Can we tailor the advanced modules?
faq.answer: Yes. Private cohorts can swap modules or double down on areas like custom GPTs, AI research, or automation workflows.

faq.question: Is there post-workshop support?
faq.answer: You receive office hours and follow-up resources to ensure your custom GPTs and projects keep delivering value.

speakers.name: Bill Raymond
speakers.title: Lead Instructor
speakers.shortBio: Bill helps teams adopt AI responsibly, blending foundational skills with advanced automation tactics that stick inside your business.
